title: Veggie Cobbler
ingredients: ['1/2 bulb fresh garlic, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 a swede', '2 carrots', '1 sweet potato', '3 florets of cauliflower', '3 florets of broccoli', '6 or 7 mushrooms', '1 punnet of cherry tomatoes', '2 tbsp cornflour', 'stock mixed with water', 'oregano', '225g self raising flour', '4 tbsp butter', '115g cheese', 'one egg', '150ml milk']
